page.title: 03The Police Station
page.content: The old police station is in{ {Ladysmith Avenue.}It is a red brick building and was built in 1908. In those days you could go to prison for a day for stealing a chicken. Imagine that! The station has two cells for keeping prisoners. Each cell had a peep hole, a door with a flap, a window and an old wooden bed. The window was the only light in the cell. There was also an exercise yard for the prisoners which is now filled with brambles. Attached to the police station are police houses. The{Sergeant}used to live in one of these. There is also an old stable in which the{Inspector}kept his pony drawn trap. There is one main office from which the policemen work which did not have much equipment.
